name: Keep Itt Alive
description: Help Cousin Itt Stay Alive in a lava-infested apocalypse so he can get back to his family.  Avoid laser-eyed chickens, and add balloons to keep him afloat, but don't go too high! WASD and Esc help you maneuver as you "Keep Itt Alive!" #keepitalive #ludumdare46 #cousinitt
